source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_00<tab>The Allagan research node is silently awaiting user interaction.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_00<tab>第III転送リングの研究システムは、静かに佇んでいる。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_01<tab>You learn that a number of rapidly reproducing, monstrous chimeras have escaped from an Allagan research facility. The research node explains that they pose a severe threat to the local environment and must be immediately terminated. Slay two Allagan chimeras.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_01<tab>研究システムから、アラグ帝国軍将兵への協力要請を聞いた。アジス・ラーのベータ管区にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20DD401 /var>」を2体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the horrifying abominations. Inform the research node that the immediate risk to the environment has been ameliorated.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20DD401 /var>を討伐した。第III転送リングの「研究システム」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_03<tab>The research node acknowledges your work and confirms that the threat to the environment has been mitigated. You learn that all attempts at creating composite life-forms have resulted in dangerous and psychologically unstable creatures, but it does not seem that the Allagan research node has any intention of putting limitations on its research.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_SEQ_03<tab>研究システムに報告した。<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20DD401 /var>は、精神が不安定だったり、繁殖力を強化しすぎたりと、問題のあるキメラ生物だったようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_000<tab><blip> <blip> Transmission received from composite life-form research facility... <buzzzzzz> ...Congratulations. You have been selected to assist in a research experiment.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_000ザ……ザザ……キメラ生成ラボより伝達。
忠実なるアラグ帝国軍将兵の諸君に、協力要請がでています。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_001<tab>Sensors indicate escape by subjects in test chamber 167-B─accelerated chimera breeding program. Subjects present an extreme risk to the surrounding environment. Recommend immediate termination of associated Allagan chimeras.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_001生体培養局から逃げ出した試作キメラ生物……
「」が繁殖を繰り返し、増え続けています。
ひとりにつき、2体の駆除をお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_010<tab>To minimize irreparable damage to the local environment, please immediately terminate two Allagan chimeras.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_010研究施設から逃げ出した合成生物……
「」が繁殖を繰り返し増え続けています。
ひとりにつき、2体の駆除をお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_020<tab><blip> <blip> Extermination of chimeras confirmed. Thank you for your service to the Allagan research program. Your satisfactory performance has been noted.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_020ザ……ザザ……の駆除を確認。
お疲れさまです、あなたのノルマは達成されました。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_021<tab>Please be assured that, while all composite life-forms attempts to date have invariably been psychologically unstable and...<buzzzzzz>...research program will not waver in its pursuit of the noble goal of... <buzzzzzz>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ918_01983_RESEARCHSYSTEM_000_021やはり3種以上の魔物の合成は、精神を不安定化するようです。
さらに量産を急ぐ余り、繁殖力を強化した点も問題でしょう。
新型種開発のため、データをラボに転送します……。
